it.polimi.softeng.connectionProtocol.server
 
it.polimi.softeng.controller
 
  • Classes in it.polimi.softeng.controller used by it.polimi.softeng.connectionProtocol.server
    Class
    Description
    Controller
    General controller with functions of: - managing ChatController and GameController (which also controls the shelfie and the board); - communicating using ServerMessageHandler
    ServerMessageHandler
    This class decodes JSON messages received from ClientHandler using JSON Parsers.
  • Classes in it.polimi.softeng.controller used by it.polimi.softeng.controller
    Class
    Description
    ChatController
    This class is used to send chat messages through ServerSide
    Controller
    General controller with functions of: - managing ChatController and GameController (which also controls the shelfie and the board); - communicating using ServerMessageHandler
    GameController
    This class allows to communicate gameMoves and the start of a game to the Model.
